text: Islami Bank Medical College is a private Medical College located in Rajshahi, Bangladesh. ==History== Islami Bank Medical College was established on 2003 in Rajshahi by Islamic bank Bangladesh. Islamic Bank is connect with the Jamaat- e-Islami Bangladesh political party. The college has an hospital attached to it. Raudha Athif, a Maldivian model, was a student in the college was found dead inside the dormitory of the college on 29 March 2017. ==References== Category:Medical colleges in Bangladesh Category:Hospitals in Bangladesh Category:Educational institutions established in 2003 Category:2003 establishments in Bangladesh Category:Organisations based in Rajshahi
title: Islami Bank Medical College
